page.title: 04Terraced Houses in Birdwell.
page.content:
Thee are many terraced houses in Birdwell especially along the main road.Some of these have recently been rebuilt because subsidence and old age had made them dangerous.
The brickwork on these houses is often poor through age.These houses have six rooms.Downstairs there is a kitchen,a dining room,and a living room.Upstairs are two bedrooms and a bathroom.
There are six to ten houses in each terraced row.The terraced row is the most obvious type of housing development in Birdwell. Infact semi-detaced houses and bungalows are more numerous now,but these are largely on estates hidden from the main road.
